< ns > Protocol Reference

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static import ($sModulePath= '')

Detailed Description

NameSpace class that provides one single method to include modules that allows project wide module imports in a consistant way. This is an abstract class.
Author:
Bas van Gaalen
Since:
1.0

Definition at line 9 of file ns.class.php.

Member Function Documentation

static ns-p.import ( $  sModulePath = ''  )  [static]

Import a given module (class file). This method includes a given class file relatively to the project's root. File extensions should be omitted (.class.php) and directories and filename should be seperated by a dot.

Parameters:
$sModulePath string Path + name of the module to include.
Returns:
bool True on success, false otherwise.
Since:
1.0
